full_summary:
========================================
### Government Tender Announcement

**F1571-220203_B: High Current Potentiostat/Galvanostat**

**Reference Number:** WS3712595973-Doc3851711925

**Publication Date:** January 31, 2023

The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) is seeking qualifed bidders for the supply, delivery, and installation of a high current potentiostat/galvanostat system for single-cell electrochemical measurements. The work must be completed by May 15, 2023.

**Procurement Details**

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Delivery Location:** Vancouver, British Columbia

**Contact Information**

* **Contracting Authority:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Person:** Daphne Yu (PSPC)
* **Contact Email:** [daphne.yu@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:daphne.yu@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice URL:** <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15279113>

### Equipment Specifications

The procurement requires the supply of a high current potentiostat/galvanostat system with the following specifications:

* Capable of measuring single-cell electrochemical processes
* Equipped with electrochemical impedance spectroscopy capabilities
* Must be delivered and installed at the NRC's Vancouver branch by May 15, 2023

All bids must be submitted through the designated procurement platform by 14:00 hours on February 16, 2023.

Please note that the procurement has expired as of the end of the publish date.

I took the relevant information from the sample entry and added information that will be relevant to the public. 

Please review and remove/edit any information deemed unnecessary or out of the scope of the public format you'd like for the tender announcement. 

Please provide any further information or feedback if necessary. 

Best regards
[Your Name]
Technical Writer
